input.sentences: the hipsters got together to have a dinner together .
they took pictures of all the different artwork .
they had a few laughs and a good time .
after that they sat down for a few beers .
output.sentences: The Men With Beards Club was having a gathering.
They were fond of teasing each other about fashion choices.
Some of the guests of the Men With Beards  intentionally wore unusual shirts.
Some of them wore wild eye glasses.
When the party started everyone, no matter what they wore, had a great time.
